name: Big Boy Boxing
storyline: Starting off as a typical underdog story, you encounter, challenge, and befriend different characters all with their own unique personalities & backstories. Almost all characters have a story to them, and their fighting style can be different during a rematch if the context is different or they are in another mood. Reading your opponent is key to getting the upper hand in the boxing ring!
summary:
Big Boy Boxing is the action, slapstick, boss-rush game where every fight comes with a punchline. Challenge all the former boxing champions and reignite the glory days of boxing!

Taking inspiration from old & new games like Cuphead & Punch-Out!!, you punch & dodge your way through over a dozen characters with distinct personalities and unique gameplay concepts.
